text: Paolo Rizzi (born 30 April 1969 in Calcinate) is an Italian retired footballer. He played as a defender. He played for Atalanta youth teams and he made his debut in Serie A on 26 February 1989 against Hellas Verona. At the end of the season Genoa was relegated in Serie B, where Matteo played one match. Then he played for Leffe and Albinese. == Career == 1986-1987 Atalanta 0 (0) 1987-1988 → L.R. Vicenza 0 (0) 1988-1989 Atalanta 1 (0) 1989-1993 Leffe 57 (0) 1993-1995 Albinese 61 (3) 1999-2003 Ghisalbese 49 (0) == External links == * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Association football defenders
title: Paolo Rizzi
